ygData.subject: Re: on training past jade/silver and some other stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: just a quick question, I was oninions or stats (if anyone has kept track or tested it)  , If I am at 40 jewelcraft, and want to train higher (only so I dont
ygData.messageBody:
just a quick question, I was oninions or stats (if anyone has kept track or
tested it) ,

If I am at 40 jewelcraft, and want to train higher (only so I dont fail so
much on Jade...) will it be cheaper to train with the next stone (pearl I
think) and silver at 6 plat or so per attemptor with electrum and malachite
(or whatever the cheapest stone is) withc would run about 2plat 5 gold per
attempt I guess what I am asking when it comes down to it...will failures
with a stone that is out of my league raise my skill? and how far outta my
league is that first gem and electrum.

on a side note...anyone have a list or know a site that has the points at
which all the blacksmithing items become trivial?

Tildin
Level 10
Enchanter Extraordinaire
Tunare Server
